Gumdrop
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop

  • Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop
    Core framework for the Gumdrop multipurpose Java server.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth
    Authentication and authorization framework for Gumdrop servers.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns
    DNS server implementation for Gumdrop.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp
    FTP (File Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http
    HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client
    Non-blocking HTTP client with an event-driven handler pattern.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.file
    Static file serving for the HTTP server.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap
    IMAP4rev2 server implementation for Gumdrop.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler
    Handler interfaces for the IMAP server.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ldap.client
    Asynchronous LDAP client for Gumdrop's non-blocking I/O framework.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3
    POP3 (Post Office Protocol version 3) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler
    Handler interfaces for the POP3 server.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.redis.client
    Asynchronous Redis client for Gumdrop's non-blocking I/O framework.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet
    Servlet 4.0 container implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.session
    HTTP session management and cluster replication.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
    SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client
    Non-blocking SMTP client for sending outbound email.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler
    SMTP client handler and state interfaces.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler
    SMTP server handler interfaces.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop 
    Class Description
    AcceptSelectorLoop
    Selector loop dedicated to accepting new connections.
    ChannelHandler
    Common interface for objects attached to SelectionKeys in the SelectorLoop.
    ChannelHandler.Type
    Channel handler types for efficient dispatch in the selector loop.
    ClientConnectionPool.PoolEntry
    An entry in the connection pool.
    ClientConnectionPool.PoolTarget
    Identifies a connection target (host, port, secure).
    ClientHandler
    Base interface for handling client-side connection lifecycle events.
    ComponentDefinition
    Represents a component definition parsed from configuration.
    ComponentRegistry
    Simple dependency injection container for Gumdrop components.
    Connection
    Abstract base class for TCP protocol handlers.
    ConnectionInfo
    Provides information about an established connection.
    Connector
    Abstract base class for connection factories.
    DatagramConnector
    Abstract base class for datagram (UDP) connection factories.
    DependencyClassLoader
    Class loader to load J2EE dependency classes from jars.
    Gumdrop
    Central configuration and lifecycle manager for the Gumdrop server.
    ParseResult
    Result of parsing a configuration file.
    PropertyDefinition
    Represents a property to be injected into a component.
    SelectorLoop
    Worker selector loop for handling I/O events.
    SendCallback
    Callback interface for handling data sent via Connection.send(ByteBuffer).
    Server
    Abstract base class for server connectors that listen on ports.
    TimerHandle
    Handle for a scheduled timer, allowing cancellation.
    TLSInfo
    Provides information about a TLS connection.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth 
    Class Description
    SelectorLoop
    Worker selector loop for handling I/O events.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.dns

    ChannelHandler
